newsitem.title: USA: Imation in development pact with TeraStor.
newsitem.headline: Imation in development pact with TeraStor.

text.p: Imation Corp said it reached a development and business agreement with TeraStor Corp to develop media for a new class of rewritable mass storage based on TeraStor's Near Field Recording technology.

Imation said it gets semi-exclusive and long-term license to manufacture, based on the new technology, products which are expected to feature user capacities of about 20 gigabytes with performance comparable to hard disk drives.
Product introduction is targeted for the first half of 1998, the company said.
Near Field Recording technology creates a new category of multi-purpose mass storage technology, said Imation, recently spun off from Minnesota Mining & Manufacturing Co.
